ValidationRule.description: Before moving to Project Status "In Construction" the following mandatory fields must be filled: Name, Programme Location, Planned Implementation Start Date.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISBLANK(Name), ISBLANK(Programme_Location__c), ISBLANK(Planned_Implementation_Start_Date__c) ), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Construction', OR( ISCHANGED(ampi__Project_Status__c), ISPICKVAL(ampi__Project_Status__c , 'In Construction'), ISPICKVAL(ampi__Project_Status__c , 'Closure'), ISPICKVAL(Phase__c , 'Implementation'), ISPICKVAL(Phase__c , 'Closure') ) )
